title: Did a BLM Organizer Say, ‘I Don’t Care If Someone Decides to Loot’?
subtitle: Chicago Mayor Lori Lightfoot said of the looting, “This is not legitimate First Amendment-protected speech ... This was straight-up felony, criminal conduct.”
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A Black Lives Matter organizer said, "I don't care if someone decides to loot."
